QuestData.Title: Pernicious Evidence
QuestData.Description: The sacks of grain emanate the foul stench you've come to associate with the Plague. This probably explains what happened to the footmen defending the mine.$B$BYou'd best bring word back to Gerald Green.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Gerald Green in Farshire.
QuestData.RewardText: Those poor lads... they never had a chance!$B$BThis sure sounds like an inside job. Probably a Cult of the Damned infiltrator. Curse those madmen!
